TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StandardPrintController extends System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController

Docs.summary: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 이 클래스를 사용합니다.
인쇄에 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> 네임 스페이스 개요입니다.

MemberSignature.Value: public StandardPrintController ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: StandardPrintController();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnEndPage (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEndPage(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnEndPage (document As PrintDocument, e As PrintPageEventArgs)
public: override void OnEndPage(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintDocument ^ document, System::Drawing::Printing::PrintPageEventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnEndPage : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
Docs.summary: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 직후 호출는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> 이벤트입니다. 내에서 예외가 throw 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> 의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 호출 되지 않습니다.
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 프린터로 보낼 개체입니다. 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 메서드 설정은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 단일 페이지의 그래픽 개체입니다. <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.
때 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 의 인쇄 컨텍스트에서 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> 는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> 의 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> 가 필요 합니다. 기본 프린터로 인쇄 필요는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> 의 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>합니다. 이 방법을 사용 하려면 다른 모든 호출을 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> 의 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
Docs.permission: 프린터에 대 한 액세스를 제어 합니다. 열거형 관련: 합니다.

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print the document.
Docs.summary: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 직후 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> 이벤트입니다. 인쇄 프로세스 중에 확인할 수 없는 예외가 throw 된 경우에 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 호출 됩니다.
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 프린터로 보낼 개체입니다. 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 메서드 설정은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 단일 페이지의 그래픽 개체입니다. <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job. -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
Docs.permission: 프린터에 대 한 액세스를 제어 합니다. 열거형 관련: 합니다.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Drawing.Graphics OnStartPage (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Drawing.Graphics OnStartPage(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Function OnStartPage (document As PrintDocument, e As PrintPageEventArgs) As Graphics
public: override System::Drawing::Graphics ^ OnStartPage(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintDocument ^ document, System::Drawing::Printing::PrintPageEventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnStartPage : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs -> System.Drawing.Graphics

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print a page in the document. Initially, the property of this parameter will be . The value returned from the method will be used to set this property.
Docs.summary: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
Docs.returns: A object that represents a page from a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 되기 직전에 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> 이벤트입니다.
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 인쇄에 사용 되는 개체입니다. 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 메서드 설정은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 단일 페이지의 그래픽 개체입니다. <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data. -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
Docs.permission: 프린터에 대 한 액세스를 제어 합니다. 열거형 관련: 합니다.

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print the document.
Docs.summary: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 직후 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> 이벤트입니다.
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 인쇄에 사용 되는 개체입니다. 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 메서드 설정은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 단일 페이지의 그래픽 개체입니다. <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 개체 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 프린터 설정이 올바른지 확인 합니다.

Docs.exception: The printer settings are not valid.
The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
Docs.permission: 프린터에 대 한 액세스를 제어 합니다. 연관 된 열거:
